description:
This is a course for absolute beginners.

You do not need previous knowledge. I will explain you everything step by step including how to install the software that we need (WAMP and Notepad++).

This course will help you learn almost everything you need to know about HTML5 and CSS3.

The code is also available in pdf format.

Over 55 lectures, quizzes and 4.5 hours of HD content.

In this course you will learn about:

HTML5:

  • tools that you need to creat websites
  • about WAMP, HTML editors
  • how to upload files to the server
  • about paragraphs, text, images, links
  • about tables, lists and forms
  • how to create a menu
  • audio and video

CSS3:

  • how to apply CSS properties to text, paragraphs, background and links
  • about CSS box model
  • aboud classes and ids
  • about text effects and colors
  • how to apply CSS to HTML forms

At the end of the course you will be able to create a website from scratch.
title: Learn HTML5 and CSS3 from scratch
